select count(1) from universal_rule as a where a.is_delete = 0
and a.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')

select concat(a.code,':',b.code) as code, concat(case a.type when 0 then '完整性' when 1 then '准确性' when 2 then '规范性' when 3 then '唯一性' when 4 then '一致性' when 5 then '关联性' end, ':',a.name,':',b.name) as name from universal_rule as a inner join personalise_rule as b on a.personalise_type = b.join_type where a.is_delete=0 and b.is_delete=0 and a.personalise_type is not null and a.relation=0 union all select c.code as code, concat(case c.type when 0 then '完整性' when 1 then '准确性' when 2 then '规范性' when 3 then '唯一性' when 4 then '一致性' when 5 then '关联性' end, ":",c.name) as name from universal_rule as c where c.relation = 1 and c.is_delete = 0
select count(1) from universal_rule where is_delete=0 and code = #{code}
select rule_code ruleCode,count(1) num from job_rule_info group by rule_code
